status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
Hi ,

I was looking for some reference to incorporate Attribution with localytics in my titanium application but I couldn't find any reference to do so. I have incorporated localytics using the attached modules.

The Localytics attribution documentation([http://docs.localytics.com/dashboard/attribution.html] ) only explains how to incorporate attribution in native apps. 
What is the feasibility of using attribution with localytics in Titanium?
fields.environment:
Titnaium SDK : 5.4.0 
Android 4.4.2 and above
IOS 8 and above

comments.body: Please check the official [Localytics Titanium module|https://github.com/localytics/localytics-titanium] and contact them for any questions. We do not maintain that module so we cannot help here.

@Shashank Garg

Not sure if you're still using Localytics or not, but I have a module I've developed that supports the functionality you're looking for. It's on Github here:
https://github.com/centrevilletech/localytics-hyperloop

Cheers!
